storefront.title: Browse Our Collection
storefront.description: Your premier source for Judaica items, ritual objects, and gifts

adminCategories.title: Manage Categories
adminCategories.name: Category Name
adminCategories.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this category?

adminProducts.title: Manage Products
adminProducts.name: Product Name
adminProducts.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this product?

adminUsers.title: Manage Users
adminUsers.onlyOwnersAccess: Only owners can access user management
adminUsers.clickAddUser: Click "Add User" to create new team members
adminUsers.deleteConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this user? This action cannot be undone.
adminUsers.passwordNote: Note: Password cannot be changed after creation

adminBranding.title: Site Branding
adminBranding.description: Customize your store's visual identity with logos, colors, and taglines
adminBranding.siteTitlesDescription: Set the title that appears on the browser tab for each language. If you set only one language title, it will be used as the default for all languages.
adminBranding.titlePlaceholder: Your store name for this language
adminBranding.titleHint: This appears in the browser tab (max 255 characters)
adminBranding.languageLabelsDescription: Customize the text that appears in the language switcher dropdown (top-left corner). Leave empty to use default language names.
adminBranding.languageLabelHint: Short text that appears in the language switcher (max 50 characters)
adminBranding.headerTitlesDescription: Set the text that appears in the header (top-left corner) for each language. Leave empty to use the browser tab title as default.
adminBranding.headerTitlePlaceholder: Your store name for the header (appears top-left)
adminBranding.headerTitleHint: This appears in the header/top-left corner (max 255 characters)
adminBranding.bannerTitlesDescription: Set the title that appears in the hero banner (center of the page) for each language. Leave empty to use the browser tab title as default.
adminBranding.bannerTitlePlaceholder: Your store name for the banner (appears in large text)
adminBranding.bannerTitleHint: This appears in the hero banner/center of storefront (max 255 characters)
adminBranding.bannerDescriptionsDescription: Set the description text that appears below the banner title for each language. Leave empty to hide the description.
adminBranding.bannerDescriptionPlaceholder: Your store description for the banner
adminBranding.bannerDescriptionHint: This appears below the banner title (max 500 characters)
adminBranding.bannerStylingDescription: Customize the banner background with a color or image. Image will override color if both are set.
adminBranding.bannerBackgroundColorHint: Choose a background color for the banner section
adminBranding.bannerBackgroundImageHint: Enter the URL of a background image for the banner (will override background color)
adminBranding.bannerBgResolution: ðŸ“· Recommended resolution: 1920x600 pixels (or maintain 16:5 aspect ratio for full-width banners)
adminBranding.bannerBgUploadFailed: Failed to upload banner background image
adminBranding.logoUrlHint: Enter the URL of your store logo image
adminBranding.logoResolution: ðŸ“· Recommended resolution: 200x60 pixels (or maintain 10:3 aspect ratio)
adminBranding.taglineHint: A short phrase that describes your store
adminBranding.faviconUrlHint: The small icon that appears in browser tabs (typically .ico or .png)
adminBranding.faviconResolution: ðŸ“· Recommended resolution: 32x32 or 64x64 pixels (square format)

adminSettings.title: Store Settings
adminSettings.noSettingsYet: Your store has no settings yet. Fill out the form below to configure your store.

auth.loginDescription: Enter your credentials to access the admin panel
auth.demoHint: Demo: Use your credentials or create a new account at /admin
